pages.text: The $(d)Redstone Tool$() is used to $(3)link certain wireless Redstone blocks to other locations$().$(br2)First use it on the linkable block to save it to the Tool. Then, use the Tool on the block you want to link the saved block to.$(br2)While holding the Redstone Tool, you'll be able to see a line connecting all linked blocks near you.
pages.title: Redstone Tool

pages.text: The Redstone Tool can be used on the following blocks:$(li)$(l:blocks/redstone/basic_redstone_interface)Basic Redstone Interface$(/l)$(li)$(l:blocks/redstone/redstone_observer)Redstone Observer$(/l)
